attributes.action: Reform murder law and re-introduce the death penalty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that no two murders are the same, and cannot be classed under one offence. We believe in degrees of murder reflecting the severity of the offence. We also believe that the death penalty must be reintroduced ASAP for first-degree murder, as it is a complete nonsense to keep people in jail for "life" for such heinous crimes.

rejection.details:
Please supply full name and address information.
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/gooddeedneeded/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
